code: import{useContext}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{CartContext}from'../context/CartContext';import ProductList from'./ProductList';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Product=_ref=>{let{product}=_ref;const{addToCart}=useContext(CartContext);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Link,{to:"/product/".concat(product.id),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image,alt:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["R$ ",product.price.toFixed(2)]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>addToCart(product),children:"Adicionar ao Carrinho"})]});};export default Product;
